src:
Iz Kolpe potegnili dve moški trupli
Po prvih zbranih obvestilih naj bi moška (enega so iz Kolpe potegnili dopoldne, drugega popoldne) utonila pri poskusu nezakonitega prestopa državne meje. 
01 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Ma. M., S. U.
Gasilci iz Črnomlja so iz Kolpe, med vasjo Vukovci in Kovačjim gradom, potegnili dve moški trupli. Kriminalisti, kriminalistični tehnik in policisti so opravili ogled kraja, o dogodku so obvestili dežurnega preiskovalnega sodnika in okrožno državno tožilko. Točen vzrok smrti bo ugotovljen s sanitarno obdukcijo.Za pomoč pri ugotavljanju identitet so kriminalisti že zaprosili tuje varnostne organe. Po prvih zbranih obvestilih naj bi moška (enega so iz Kolpe potegnili dopoldne, drugega popoldne) utonila pri poskusu nezakonitega prestopa državne meje.
text:
Two male corpses were pulled from the Kolpa
According to the first information collected, a man (one was pulled from the Kolpa in the morning, the other in the afternoon) is said to have drowned while attempting to cross the state border illegally.
01 Nov 2019, 07:00 by Ma. M., S. U.
Crnomelj firefighters pulled two male corpses from Kolpa, between the village of Vukovci and Kovac Castle. Criminologists, criminal technicians and police officers conducted a tour of the place and informed the incident on duty of the investigating magistrate and the District Attorney. The exact cause of death will be determined by a sanitary autopsy. Criminals have already sought foreign security authorities to help identify them. According to the first information collected, a man (one was pulled from the Kolpa in the morning, the other in the afternoon) is said to have drowned while attempting to cross the state border illegally.
